Art. 6(1)(f) of the GDPR.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Where the processing of your personal information is based on your consent, you have a right to withdraw such consent at any time. However, this will not affect the lawfulness of processing based on your consent before its withdrawal.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The basis for you providing personal information and sensitive personal information is partly comes from a statutory requirement, partly from a contractual requirement under your employment contract, and partly from a need for the information to carry out the employment relationship with you. In general, you must provide the personal information and sensitive personal information, except when we indicate that certain information is voluntary (e.g., in connection with employee satisfaction surveys). Not providing certain personal information and sensitive personal information, (which we will inform you about by marking the relevant information as required or certain information as voluntary, in which case other information is required) may prevent the Company from carrying out the employment relationship with you and, in some circumstances, may require the Company to terminate your employment.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
